title: Jonny B. Jizzin: The Simp Chronicles: Vol.1 - Sextraterestrial
description: 2nd Edition of "Jonny. B. The Simp Chronicels - Vol.1" contains additional illustrations as requsted by readers as well as a few editing tweaks. Hey guys! I’m Jonny B. Jizzin, and I’ve got a really big problem… There’s this gorgeous babe from college, named Chanel. And when I say gorgeous, I mean crazy hot! Long, dark flowing curls, perfect pouty lips, banging curves, you know – the whole package! But… She’s with this giant oaf who calls himself ‘Chocolate Cameron’. Sounds like a male-stripper name, right? He’s such a basic bro too. UGH! What’s he have that I don’t? Besides driving a BMW…and his massive arms…and a sense of fashion… Wait a minute…I can get all of that too! All I need is an awesome job, right? If I get a fancy new whip and some better clothes, I can woo Chanel to my side! That’s how all of this works, right? Right? Join me, friends, as I embark on an insane journey after a busty scientist “recruits” me for a series of odd jobs for quick cash. My courage, wit, and…AHEM…stamina, will all be tested! How far will one guy simp for the girl of his dreams? Find out Jonny B. The Simp Chronicles -- Volume 1 – Sextraterrestrial Written by Lolo X Eros
author: Lolo X Eros
